eu.barkmin.processing.scratch

Class ScratchStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.barkmin.processing.scratch.ScratchStage

  • public class ScratchStage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the scratch stage. Only one object of this class can be created.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PApplet parent

      • addBackdrop

        public void addBackdrop(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String imagePath)
        Add a backdrop to the stage. If a backdrop with the received name already exists do nothing.
        Parameters:
        name - a unique name
        imagePath - a image path

      • switchBackdrop

        Switch to a backdrop by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of a backdrop

      • addTimer

        public void addTimer(java.lang.String name)
        Add a new timer by name. Overwriting default is not permitted.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the timer

      • removeTimer

        public void removeTimer(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a timer by name. Removing of default is not permitted.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the timer
